subject: Congratulations: From Bangkok Bank Thailand
body:
Bangkok Bank Thailand, 919/1 อาคาร Jewelry
Trade Center ซอย สุรศักดิ์ ชั้น 6-B1 Si Lom, Silom,
Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500
REF: - PAYMENT CODE: ECB/066
Tel: +66 (096-571-6139)



Attention: Beneficiary,

Official Notice: this is to acknowledge the receipt of an instruction
Payment Order in your favor Valued at US$5.000.000.00, Five Million United
States Dollars Only from United Nations and World Bank.

Be informed that this Bank has been mandated by the United Nations and
World Bank Organization to offset your due Payment Valued US$5.000.000.00
with immediate effect.

Meanwhile, we have concluded all arrangements to Set up an online bank
account on your name and forward the online bank account to you so that you
will start to make a transfer from your online bank account to any bank of
your choice.

Note that the Bangkok Bank will issue an ATM Card on your behalf which will
be delivered to your home address by DHL Delivery Company Service after
your online bank account is opened.

To proceed with the release of your funds as instructed by United Nations
and World Bank, you are required to get back to us with information below.

Careful file the information below:

Full Name:
Residential Address:
Mobile Number:
Date of Birth:
Nationality:
A copy of your Drive License:

Furthermore, upon confirmation of this information. we shall proceed
further for the final process of your online bank account.

Thank you for choosing Bangkok Bank Thailand. We appreciate the Opportunity
to serve you. Do not hesitate to ask question (s) where you consider
necessary for clarification.

             CONGRATULATIONS!

Thanks and God bless you,

Sincerely yours,
Mrs. Samir EL Saleh
CEO / Head of Transaction & Transfer Department
